com.fatwire.gst.foundation.controller.action

Class ActionFrameworkController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fatwire.gst.foundation.controller.AbstractController
      • com.fatwire.gst.foundation.controller.action.AbstractActionController
        • com.fatwire.gst.foundation.controller.action.ActionFrameworkController
  • Deprecated. 
    as of release 12.x, replace GSF Actions with WCS 12c's native Controllers and/or wrappers

    public class ActionFrameworkController
extends AbstractActionController
    AbstractActionController that is using the AppContext to configure the ActionLocator and ActionNameResolver.
    Since:
    Mar 15, 2011
    Author:
    Tony Field, Dolf Dijkstra
